content.title: 'Dune: Part Two' review: An instant modern sci-fi classic
Box Office: 'Dune Part Two' Delivers Big $82M Opening Weekend

results:
Based on the search results, here's what I found about "Dune: Part Two" (2024) and its box office success and cultural phenomenon status:

## Box Office Success

Denis Villeneuve's sequel opened to $82.5 million in North America this weekend, double the first film and the biggest start of the year to date.(no content)Dune 2 is likewise whipping up a sandstorm overseas, where it opened to $100 from 71 markets for a global start of $182.5 million.(no content)It's a major win for Legendary in broadening the audience for its Dune franchise, and is the biggest opening to date for Villeneuve and Chalamet. The film also performed exceptionally well in premium formats, with Imax theaters delivering $32.2 million of the total global gross, or a notable 18 percent. In 10 markets, Imax enjoyed its biggest opening ever.

## Cultural Phenomenon Status

Denis Villeneuve has likely just delivered the best film of 2024 and cemented Dune as a newfound cultural phenomenon. Critics are describing it in remarkably strong terms, with one reviewer stating "I can confidently say this will go down as one of the greatest blockbusters ever made."(no content)Dune: Part Two is described as "an instant box-office success, and the beginning of a new pop-culture sensation" and "an iconic, generation-defining film epic that will be remembered for years and years to come."

## Critical Reception

The film received outstanding critical and audience reception. It earned "a glowing A CinemaScore, compared to an A- for the first, and stellar reviews."(no content)Critics praised it as "visually thrilling and narratively epic" continuing "Denis Villeneuve's adaptation of the beloved sci-fi series in spectacular form."

The film is being hailed as "simply unlike any other blockbuster in existence" and "a quintessential sci-fi masterpiece."
